Reviews.Content: hotel calzaiuoli best returned trip italy florence definitely favorite city stayed hotel calzaiuoli elegant clean centrally located hotel room corner room windows facing via del calzaiuoli via del corso street started act hour got watch window get noisy night part charm room always close windows peace quiet breakfast buffet variety choices room well maintained everything walking distance made reservations though hotels website everything went smoothly hoped definitely stay hotel

Reviews.Content: fantastic location stayed week september pleased hotel rates lower september around 130 night remember correctly high season front desk staff efficient helpful though didnt much except checkin checkout hotels fantastic location along wide avenue filled fashion cafes ice cream shops many wonderful restaurants within 3 minutes walk short walk duomo ponte vecchio attractions santa maria train station walking distance well street zone except taxis worries getting room comfortable bathroom great especially european standards bed typically european firm especially comfortable though hardly fault hotel breakfast spread great scrambled eggs bacon ham croissants cheeses etc breakfast roll spread every morning waitress prepare cappuccino espresso drink well breakfast great start day sightseeing definitely stay next time florence
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: great florence hotel stay 4 nights beginning may perfect hotel could conveniently located heart florence room 4th floor spacious clean quiet night double windows despite busy street good airconditioning excellent breakfast staff stay next visit florence
Reviews.Author: grammajam

Reviews.Content: superb location hotel fantastic location heart action florence room huge comparison others stayed italy spotlessly clean great view back building got noise staff pleasant enough italian standards would definitely recommend looking value money especially youre staying 3 nights different discount got 20 euro per night right middle major sights sounds florence
Reviews.Author: emma12882

Reviews.Content: wonderful stay though bit splurge us definitely worth florence college second trip back since bringing parents first trip italy ended wonderful hotel would love go back would recommend anyone though expensive trip treat well worth perfect location heart downtown florence asked view duomo got bells morning liked staff friendly helped us reservations brought luggage room wonderful breakfast cereal scrambled eggs though little runny taste croissants cheeses juices water course would definitely go back
Reviews.Author: hamano03

Reviews.Content: service bath
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: marvelous hotel everything hotel calzaiuoli perfect well okay name tricky speak little italian sounds like step inside know immediately youre going love stay tasteful close elegant started beautiful staircase definitely go back see finished work way dont word staircase 4th floor used prompt smooth elevator entire hotel spotless gracious staff made us feel welcome room delighted us comfortable beds good closet space opened tall windows beautiful dome tower want view ask upper floor room back bath large lots counter space instead little glass shelves plenty soft clean towels loved going breakfast charming blue white morning room fresh fruit juices cereals croissants hot bacon scrambled eggs cafe die dont skip free meal give good start beautiful walks take 2 short blocks vecchio gallery walked minutes several good restaurants dinners shops every little surrounding street found great famous open market immediate vicinity well magnificent visit rich would live hotel calzaiuoli room key would gold spend rest days seeing dont miss city dont miss delightful hotel
Reviews.Author: EmmetFitzhume

Reviews.Content: dont look know background spent florence college definitely consider city good idea everything see go thanksgiving spent 5 days florence looking hotel base search 3 things location quality price far location goes nothing hotel right via one main roads florence great location course comes noise lucky room back building winter heard nothing course 23 years old probably one people making noise 2 morning stuck head window looked left duomo right outside window far concern get better quality complaints understand italian version customer service different american ones dont far concerned give key end day pretty much want customer service go ritz new york city hear theyre real friendly say concierge rude polite find way italians tell speak english help know americans ones enough speak one language far continental breakfast definitely enjoyed breakfast room cozy food simple yet fabulous im bread jam kind girl quite frankly finding eggs easy toast bacon sausage us none event price right price absolutely amazing hotel opinion cant better florence hotel great absolutely cant get lost way major sights walk door turn left theres crazy think almost choose hotel one two picky people like looking negative comments anything tripadvisor notice country people come please try remember going italy experience italy arent flying far eat american food watch american tv go bed early many people lucky enough go much less twice best part travelling things go according plan personally love get lost streets somewhere new upon beautiful sunset map cant always take really want go enjoy every moment trip florence feel free contact questions
Reviews.Author: Chantalette

Reviews.Content: nice hotel great location nice 3star hotel professional staff location right middle great room ample breakfast thing lacking ample public space front desk
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: great location florence husband returned florence italy 5 night trip stayed hotel calzaiuoli hotel perfect location sightseeing florence literally within several minutes walking distance major sights florence never far sightseeing hotel one block piazza della lively street scene outdoor cafes entertainment hotel attractive clean beds comfortable breakfast adequate european breakfast american quite enough breakfast room attractive bad things read reviews front desk clerks helpful felt unfriendly helpful sense duty four different clerks one genuinely friendly helpful also hotel turned central air conditioning open window last two nights resulted lots street noise nights able keep windows shutters closed heard noise florence thought rude front desk clerks lack air conditioning last two nights wouldnt change hotels came florence would stay hotel primarily location great
Reviews.Author: lass=

Reviews.Content: loved stay wife stayed october 8th 2004 based reviews asked nonsmoking room duomo view got one room windows opened see red rooftops florence duomo left wonderful look morning room reasonably quiet spacious smelled fine ac worked well bed quality good great bathroom small shower stall shower suffered problem ive experience many italy hotels shower curtain bit careful keep getting water floor plus side bathroom clean marble linens always fine cereal scrambled eggs toast juice fruit etc wife got around 7am every morning usually ones one woman breakfast would bring coffee really enjoyed stay location superb minutes duomo one direction uffizi gallery cant really comment staff never needed anything us would stay
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: charming hotel charming hotel clean soundproof well rooms hard find better situated hotel steps away florence major attractions highly recommended
Reviews.Author: louise04

Reviews.Content: excellent hotel priced well hotel recently updated perfect location florence wonderful large room view duomo hear noise even nearly sound proof windows outside inside shutters well heavy curtains florence rooms well appointed clean staff helpful except guy works night enjoy
Reviews.Author: alteredego

Reviews.Content: good value great location also found room smelling smoke requested non smoking room rooms full opened window see view duomo left open day came back room longer smelled smoke relief well working air conditioner bathroom narrow long nice counter marble room larger many stayed italy huge fancy room bad thought breakfast room wonderful sunny open food excellent problem finding selection food best whole two week trip location fantastic would stay
Reviews.Author: MWhitney

Reviews.Content: terrible hotel im surprised read good reviews since really hotel entered room terrible smell smoke bathroom small poorly lit reminded bad vegas hotel room room good size good thing air conditioner worked impossible sleep windows open faced side street noisy yes centrally located many hotels well main touristy part florence small anyway doesnt really matter didnt really deal staff much dont opinion either way
Reviews.Author: Gabrella

Reviews.Content: excellent choice great location hotel cozy quaint room nice clean well maintained breakfast nice variety beautifully served location amazing two blocks duomo blocks uffizi walked everywhere didnt need taxi florence clean wonderful although quite highly recommend calzaiuoli would stay next visit travel agent include list clients
Reviews.Author: Urbanchik

Reviews.Content: excellent location clean nice hotel excellent location florence rented two rooms family clean modern back hotel found quiet breakfast good room days none us complaints quality food beverages clean often simply werent enough people taking care area efficiently avoid hassle going breakfast earlier everything well stocked hard eat cold cereal hand drink juices straight common whole breakfast complaints hotel come car dont front desk staff drive right hotel ease told day hotel street despite told police let wasnt experience avoid hassle driving city means pain trying park anywhere close hotel issues hotel really nice place nice location price fair get central florence well worth
Reviews.Author: Houston_travellover

Reviews.Content: ok although agree location amazing rooms really simple clean breakfast awful didnt even finish first mornings breakfast idea eating also doorman sweet spoke english rest staff friendly even helpful everything seemed even saw spoke italian change things would stay city many places great location sure better staff breakfast
Reviews.Author: sussrum

Reviews.Content: great location highly recommend returned vacation italy picked hotel reviews incredible location everything want see right outside front door checked us 12 noon else check early room clean bathroom clean requested top floor gave street noise windows double opened windows hear church bells beautiful stayed two nights helped reservations uffizi gallery printed train station departure times even held bags us checked till wanted spend time florence shopping remember foreign country need expect different need try speak italian appreciate english speaking staff consider grateful anything cant speak two fluent languages give credit great website great pictures plus provide lovely continental eggs bacon croissants coffee etc wont disappointed stay would stay heart beat
Reviews.Author: FUO

Reviews.Content: great location staff needs hospitality training mostly agree travelers especially regarding location tourist sites within 510 minute walk hotel nice hot days able return hotel quick shower change clothes unfortunately staff unfriendly except cool addition charged twice stay checking caused us guests waiting check 20 minute fix problem 20 charge exchange rates received apology left poor last impression unfortunate really nice hotel deserves
Reviews.Author: Kakiebell

Reviews.Content: nice hotel great location really enjoyed stay hotel calzaiuoli two rooms family nice clean surprised hotel rated 3 stars location excellent great able walk right door hotel everything location also us allowed two sons walk around sites florence alone hotel within easy reach staff wasnt friendly helpful italian cities polite
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: excellent location location first hotel florence transferred hotel calzaiuoli last two nights location perfect staff friendly rooms simple clean neat requested rooms back hotel quiet would definitely recommend stay
Reviews.Author: Italy5

Reviews.Content: great place great location everything room facing back nice quiet room large huge bathroom modern shower staff helpful making dinner reservations booking tours breakfast fair adequate would definitely recommend hotel
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: great hotel hotel surprisingly great value triple room room actually separate sleeping room television air conditioning control location perfect convenient everything breakfast wonderful staff accomodating friendly
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: good location price location hard beat youre quick walk anywhere price right least 20 euro cheaper comparable hotels rome venice staff left something desired nothing make wife feel welcome asked even question like eat room clean great view one busier streets florence shower every time used would drain 15 minutes would recommend hotel im sure better hotels similar price florence
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: great hotel returned italy spent three nights florence hotel excellent would say much 4 star hotel 3 star hotel ive seen location fantastic doesnt get better everything short walking distance street area hotel nice ask face back away street room extremely quiet requested view duomo didnt get told 4 rooms view duomo look rooftops nice hotel remodeled great shape colors nice elegant amenities good nice modern bathroom bit small shower breakfast great pretty room didnt think staff helpful luckily didnt need much hotel excellent value would definitely stay return trip florence
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: unbeatable location well priced reviews mention cant beat location center shopping restaurants 2 min walk piazza duomo rooms tastefully decorated bathroom small modern quite clean breakfast good though large corner room great view adjacent square minor complaint front desk staff helpful times great value price would definitely stay
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: great location attentive value husband returned delightful 6 day stay florence late may 2004 choice hotel room windows opening onto calzaiuoli corso streets well stunning view piazza della room good sound insulation small nice modern bathroom large comfortable bed space closet inroom safe minibar breakfast room staff food consistently good w eggs bacon daily desk staff spoke decent english helpful would recommend hotel great could get duomo piazza ends street quickly lots enjoy mix safe area lively day noisy 9pm public restaurant airconditioning problem heat summer enjoy
Reviews.Author: Richtravels_7

Reviews.Content: small elegant located returned 10 day trip rome florence could happier decision stay hotel calzaiuoli hotel literally center historical center room immaculate quiet decorated breakfast served attractive room second floor staff polite reserved hotel ambience boutique hotel prices reasonable florence great shops restaurants close would certainly return perfect hotel
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: wonderful choice spent six nights calzaiuoli march couldnt happier room lovely view breathtaking breakfasts fantastic location perfect right piazza actually steps duomo id return
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: loved calzaiuoli excellent price location staff friendly helpful complimentary breakfast pretty breakfast room nice must remodeled attractive rooms baths wonderful hotel real bargain florence opened bathroom window felt like right next duomo stayed expensive savoy block away felt pleased calzaiuoli
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: excellent central hotel returned 12 day trip italy pleasure staying hotel first 3 nights beautifully decorated hotel perfectly located excellent restaurants within steps front door triple double definitly stay hotel nice breakfast
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: location location location last october arrived florence late night found hotel booked expected next morning set find something better found calzaiuoli stayed six nights smack middle everything wonderful room view duomo also wonderful restaurant recommendations couple men front desk plan go back next year definately stay
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: great hotel center florence stayed hotel calzaiuoli four days last october wonderful time hotel located center main sites florence made difference us walked everywhere could easily stop back hotel room large nice air conditioning actually didnt actually need much help staff always cordial ask
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: good hotel price excellent central location rooms nicely decorated breakfast adequate nothing special real complaint rooms somewhat warm even heat room turned ac turned hotel outside temperatures 60s late november keep room cool enough sleep open windows needed earplugs street noise excessive windows open noise problem windows closed however
